Help.title: Help Center
Help.subtitle: Answers to common questions, setup guides, and ways to get in touch.

q1.q: How do I create or join a team?
q1.a: Owners can create teams from the Team switcher. To join, accept an email invitation from an owner or admin. Invitations also appear in your Notifications.

q2.a: Roles are owner, admin, and regular. Owners can manage billing, deletion, and member roles. Admins manage settings and members (except roles). Regular users have standard access.

q3.q: How can I change a member's role?
q3.a: Only the team owner can change roles in Settings → Members using the role dropdown next to each member.

q4.a: Check spam, then verify your email is correct in Account settings. You can re-send confirmation emails. If issues persist, contact support.

q5.q: How do I report a bug or request a feature?
q5.a: Use the Feedback button in the top bar. Provide steps to reproduce or your feature idea for quickest turnaround.

quick.title: Quick Start
quick.step1: Create or pick a team from the switcher in the sidebar.
quick.step3: Assign roles and configure team settings.
quick.step4: Explore the Dashboard to track activity and notifications.
quick.tip: Tip: Use ⌘/Ctrl + 1..9 to quickly switch teams.

item1.title: Change email or password
item1.body: Update these in Account settings. You’ll need to confirm email changes via a verification link.

item2.title: Managing members
item2.body: Owners and admins can invite/remove members. Only owners can change roles and delete the team.

item3.title: Exporting data
item3.body: Contact support via Feedback to request data exports while we finalize in-app export tools.

resources.title: Resources
resources.item2: Status: surfaced in-app if there are issues
resources.item3: Security: we use email confirmation and session protection

contact.title: Contact
contact.lead: Can’t find what you need? Use the Feedback button in the top bar to reach us.
